name: Rider
passiveSkills: Remove Immunity and Perfect Immunity from all enemies at the start of battle
25% Chance to inflict 1 Mark for two turns on up to two random enemies when you take damage
Removes all Immunity Effects, including Vanish and Perfect Immunity, and inflict Perfect Sleep on all enemies for 2 turns When you reach 1 HP
Heal for full HP and grant increased Power and Fury Generation to all allies for the duration of battle when you reach 1 HP.
